display_long_description:
· Awareness of the dangers of multiple dense situations
> Experience the dangers of crushing accidents in crowded places in a virtual environment. Through this, understand the dangers of multiple dense situations and learn the importance of prevention.

· Choosing a Safe Place to Watch
> Learn how to select a safe viewing location at a concert hall or festival site. Learn how to select the best location by considering the distance from the emergency exit and the density of surrounding crowds.

· Check the escape route
> Learn how to locate emergency exits and escape routes in advance when entering the venue. This ensures prompt evacuation in the event of an emergency.

· one-way traffic
> Learn how to move in one direction to avoid collisions in crowded situations. Learn the importance of orderly movement.

· Move to an empty space
> Learn how to avoid pressure by moving to a relatively relaxed space in a dense crowd. Learn how to minimize the risk of crushing.

· Taking care of yourself and imitating your posture
>Leave yourself to the flow of the crowd and experience how to prevent falling by adjusting your posture according to the movements of the people around you. Through this, you learn how to behave safely in a crowd.

· Picking up your phone and holding a pole
> Learn how to maintain balance by holding onto poles or fixed objects without picking up objects that have fallen in crowded situations. This will teach you how to avoid unnecessary actions and ensure your safety.
